header.name: Alaa Mousa Hasan
header.title: Service Engineer | Automation Expert
header.description: I am a dedicated Service Engineer with a Master's in Computer Engineering and a Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering. My strong background in automation and computer systems drives my passion for creating innovative solutions that streamline workflows and enhance productivity.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a Service Engineer with a strong background in automation and computer engineering. I create efficient solutions for technical challenges.
